    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Kako je pravljica zgrajena</string>
            <string language="en">The structure of a fairy tail</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Struktur eines fairy Endstücks</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La structure d'une queue féerique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A estrutura de uma cauda fairy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La struttura di una coda fairy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η δομή μιας ουράς νεράιδων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La estructura de una cola de hadas</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Učenec spozna osnovne dele zgradbe pravljice in poskuša tudi sam opisati dele zgradbe znane pravljice. Uči se poiskati bistveno v besedilu, uporabljati ključne besede. Razlikuje med bistvenimi in nebistvenimi deli zgodbe. Naslov pravljice lahko zamenjate, če boste učni list uporabili za neko drugo, konkretno pravljico, ki jo obravnavate.</string>
            <string language="en">Description of typical fairy tail - introduction, core and conclusion.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">pravljica</string>
            <string language="en">fairy tale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">uvod</string>
            <string language="en">introduction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">jedro</string>
            <string language="en">core</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">zaključek</string>
            <string language="en">conclusion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">struktura</string>
            <string language="en">structure</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beschreibung des typischen fairy Endstücks - 
Einleitung, Kern und Zusammenfassung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Description de queue féerique typique - 
introduction, noyau et conclusion.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Descrição da cauda fairy típica - introdução,
núcleo e conclusão.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Descrizione della coda fairy tipica - 
introduzione, nucleo e conclusione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Περιγραφή της χαρακτηριστικής ουράς νεράιδων - 
εισαγωγή, πυρήνας και συμπέρασμα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Descripción de la cola de hadas típica - 
introducción, base y conclusión.</string>
          </description>
